summary:
Skimpy Nocturnal Robe for Calientes CBBEv3 curvy body, CBBEv3M, UNP main body and UNP Blessed Body..plus ADEC Nude No Physics
with additional fur meshes.. three themes one ghost theme and two non ghost themes..
standalone,craftable,enchantable..
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nrh7k9.png[/img][/center]

[size=3][center]Hi folks,[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]This is the Nocturnal Spirit, a skimpy nocturnal robe.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]It includes some fur on neck and forearms which has no ghost effect on purpose.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]There is the ghost and non ghost version of the robe.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]There is no hood![/center][/size]

                                                               [center] [u][color=#f6b26b][size=5]Important:[/size][/color][/u][/center]

[size=3][center]even if it´s downloadable with NMM, you still need to install it manually![/center][/size]

[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2drgccm.png[/img][/center]

[center][size=3]You will need the following mods (depending on which body you choose)[/size][/center]


[center][size=3]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - CBBEv3- (curvy body which is the body inside the mainfiles folder)[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]get it here - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url][/size][/center]

[center][color=#cc0000][size=3]or[/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=3]CBBEv3M[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]available here - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13180/?]CBBEv3M Body Replacer[/url][/size][/center]

[center][color=#cc0000][size=3]or[/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=3]UNP main body, download it here:[/size][/center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?][center][size=3]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/size][/center][/url]

[center][size=3][color=#cc0000]or[/color]
[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]UNP Blessed body mod UNPB,[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]download link:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14899/?] UNPB Blessed body mod UNPB[/url][/size][/center]

[center][color=#cc0000][size=3]or[/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=3]Acdale Eye Candy Body ADEC Nude No Physics[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]download link: [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible[/url][/size][/center]


[center][color=#ffe599][size=5]Optional:[/size][/color][/center][center][/center]

[size=3][center]The pink Leatherboots in the screenshots are recolored barmaid boots available as optional.[/center][/size]
[size=3][center](Readme included for installation instructions)[/center][/size]

[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/t4y5hy.png[/img][/center]

[size=3][center]In any case you need to download the Nocturnal Spirit main file! then just download the additional body type meshes [/center][/size]

[size=3][center]and replace the main file meshes with the available body type of your choice.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]1. Open the downloaded archive[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]2. Place the ESP file into your skyrim data folder[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]3. Inside the Textures folder you will find the Fur textures as well as the three different themes, [/center][/size]

[size=3][center]copy and paste the Data folder of the Fur textures over your existing Data folder in Skyrim directoy.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]4. Choose a theme! (only one of three can be used-read Content above for information on themes) [/center] [/size]

[size=3][center]copy and paste the Data folder over the Data folder in Skyrim directory.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]5. Inside the Meshes folder you´ll find two different body types, both including a Ghost and Normal Folder choose what you like to use.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center](there is a Data folder inside the ghost and normal folder).[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]copy and paste the Data folder (which is inside the ghost or normal folder) over the Data folder in Skyrim directory. [/center] [/size]




[center]Personally i use wrye bash to manage my mods, you can get it here -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?] Wrye Bash[/url][/center]

[center](highly recommended)[/center]

[center]That´s it![/center]



[color=#ffe599][size=5][center]In game:[/center][/size][/color]

[center]First of all, the robe will show up as the barkeeper female clothes in the inventory[/center]

[center]named Nocturnal Spirit Ultraviolet no matter which theme you choose..[/center]

[center](I decided not to update the ESP file yet)[/center]

[center]to obtain the robe you will need following perks:[/center]

[center]1. ElvenSmithing[/center]

[center]2. ArcaneBlacksmith[/center]

[center]You can craft it at the smithing forge under misc.[/center]

[center]to create the robe at the smithing forge you´ll need these ingredients:[/center]

[center]Dwarven Oil x2[/center]
[center]Daedra Heart x1[/center]
[center]Foxpeltsnow x1[/center]
[center]Sabrecatpelt x1[/center]
[center]Leatherstrips x2[/center]
[center]SoulGemGrand x1[/center]

[center]The value has been set to 1475, based on ingredients.[/center]

[center]to improve the item on the smithing table you´ll need one soulgem Greater, one Leatherstrip plus one Dwarven oil.[/center]

[center]And yes of course..not to forget..for all´ya cheating wifes here is the Nocturnal Spirit ID - 0A000D63[/center]

[center]Simply open the console and type in player.additem 0A000D63 "1"[/center]

[color=#ffe599][size=5][center]Uninstall:[/center][/size][/color]

[center]Delete Data/meshes/clothes/nocturnal spirit/f[/center]

[center]Delete Data/textures/clothes/nocturnal spirit[/center]

[center]Delete Data/Nocturnal Spirit.esp[/center]

[center]Simple as that![/center]


[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]CHANGELOG[/center][/size][/color]

[center]v1.1[/center]

[center]- Working weightsliders [/center]

[center]- CBBEv3M available now.[/center]

[center]- Changed/tweaked all Normalmaps, Fur looks more natural now..(no metalic glance) , everything is less specular.[/center]

[center]- Slightly smoothed out fur meshes without adding addiional polys.[/center]

[center]- No ghost version with two themes/textures available now. ( textures are always changing for the better with every update, nothing is finished yet)[/center]

[center]- Texture changed for Nocturnal Spirit Ultraviolet (new belt texture, removed rune-text from skull on the back)[/center]

[center]- revised CBBEv3-curvy robe mesh (mainly for a nicer belt appearance)[/center][color=#ffe599][size=4][center][/center][/size][/color]
[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]Content:[/center][/size][/color]
[center]v1.1[/center]

[center]- Nocturnal Spirit for CBBEv3 - curvy body mesh (main body) and CBBEv3M both with ghost and normal (no ghost effect) robe meshes plus first person meshes.[/center]

[center]- three texture/color variants and normal maps for the robe (4096x4096) [/center]
[center]- Nocturnal Spirit Ultraviolet ( for use with ghost meshes, though you can use it with normal meshes but it´s not meant to be)[/center]
[center]- Nocturnal spirit Chrome Skull which is kind of Latex (for use with normal <no ghost> meshes , otherwise there will be nearby nothing visible of the robe)[/center]
[center]- Nocturnal Spirit Grey Winter (for use with normal meshes,if used with ghost mesh the robe appears more white..this is also not recommended)[/center]
[center]- fur textures with normalmaps (4096x4096)[/center]
[center]- ESP file (no replacer, craftable, enchantable, improvement up to flawless) [/center]
[center]- under mainfiles there is the UNP main body, UNPB and ADEC Nude No Physics available[/center]


[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]Next to come:[/center][/size][/color]

[center]-Improved Textures, new themes, colors for ghost and no ghost.[/center]

[center]-standalone BOOTS!!![/center]

[center]- new ESP file[/center]


[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]Issues:[/center][/size][/color]

[center]-there may be some clipping in some situations/movements..[/center]
[center]i´ll do my best to get rid of all´them.[/center]
[center]-i´ve tested it on nord female characters only.[/center]
[center]-please report anything which is wrong to me so i can optimize it.[/center]

[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]All credits goes to:[/center][/size][/color]

[center]Caliente for the amazing nude female body mod -CBBEv3-[/center]

[center]MAK07 for the extraordinary CBBEv3M mod[/center]

[center]Dimon99 for the extraordinary UNP-female body and UNP Blessed Body mod[/center]

[center]Calyps for the outstanding UNP Blessed Body mod UNPB[/center]

[center]Acdale for the serious Eye Candy Body ADEC[/center]

[center]Phygit for the slinky feet included in UNP mod[/center]

[center]Stakado for Cinemascope ENB - Near to zero performance loss - Skyrim goes Hollywood with that![/center]

[center]Apachii, for beeing the top hairdresser[/center]

[center]FavoredSouls for the colorchanging bling bling! [/center]

[center]Let´s hear it for Bathesda!! A thousand thanks![/center]

[center]Thanks in advance to all the people who are interested in my mod, thanks for testing and trying to help me out with problems.[/center]


[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]FAQ[/center][/size][/color]

[center]Will there be a Vanilla version?[/center]

[center]in great haste...lol[/center]

[center]Will there be other colors/textures?[/center]

[center]There will be various types (not only other colors but also different textures, Enchibaer is open for suggestions or wishes)[/center]

[center]Will there be a long robe version?[/center]

[center]Certainly not, beeing the reason for me to start this mod.(There are other Nocturnal robe mods out there to cover this)[/center]

[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]Permissions:[/center][/size][/color]
[center]you are allowed to do anything, just credit me as the original creator[/center]
[center]Stay tuned to updates coming soon![/center]

[color=#ffe599][size=4][center]my other mods released as FoGGyPaTh[/center][/size][/color]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73838/?]Lucidity Sound FX[/url][/center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62955/?][center]Lock o Motion[/center][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67453/?][center]CoP - Whiterun[/center][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67585/?][center]CoP - Windhelm[/center][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67800/?][center]CoP - Markarth[/center][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68058/?][center]CoP - Riften[/center][/url]


[center]Take care![/center]

[center]Enchibaer/Foggypath[/center]
author: Enchibaer
